text: Lygiohypotyphla is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *L. bicolor Steyskal, 1972 *L. hyalipennis Vanschuytbroeck, 1963 *L. nigripennis (Hendel, 1934) *L. ruwenzoriensis Vanschuytbroeck, 1963 *L. saegeri Vanschuytbroeck, 1963 == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Africa Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Günther Enderlein
title: Lygiohypotyphla
